title: David92506
author: David92506
content: I met a young and beautiful Asian woman on a dating site. She is 27 years younger than me.She belongs to a professional cryptocurrency organization that provides multi-millionaires with when and what coin to trade. About 3 - 4 trades a week.The reason she belongs to the group is because her Uncle runs it.She said she will give me the trades for free.We have done several video chats so she is real.I used to trade FOREX heavily so I thought Cryptocurrency would be similar.I open a Coinbase account.She tells me to Buy Bitcoin and keep it for 60 seconds and then sell it.I don't know how to work Coinbase but I do see Bitcoin go up and up.So now I'm trying to learn how to trade on Coinbase.She gives me another trade, with the same instructions, Buy and hold on for 60 seconds and then sell. But I don't know how to do that. Bitcoin goes up and up.I'm amazed at how this professional group is able to do this. She said that I can't trade on Coinbase because it doesn't offer the features that her platform does. On her platform, she can Buy and hold on to it and Sell it in 60 seconds. You can't do that with Coinbase.So she wants me to transfer all of my Coinbase money into the platform she uses, which is:BitContractProShe has $100,000 in her account. She averages $10,000 a month.She will teach me how to trade on that platform.

comments.author: Eh Moo Nah
comments.body: Quote from: David92506 on June 16, 2023, 02:22:22 PM~~~I think This post should be moved to the Off Topic Section or Trading Discussion not here in the Marketplace.also I don't get the point of this post? are you offering something here?

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: The way the "woman" charms you is like a classic scam that happens on many dating sites. I think an average profit of 10k per month is achievable if she is only a professional trader, and generally they don't have the time just to give random beginners guidance specifically because it will return them nothing.I hope you haven't fallen too much into that woman's trap. Better forget this story, you will not get a sweet ending.

comments.author: David92506
comments.body: Thank you for taking the time to read my post and respond.I've learned that there are fake crypto websites and if you deposit money into them you will never get your money back.I'm assuming the website she uses is one of them.

comments.author: yudi09
comments.body: Clearly ask how he trades if he is a professional trader who always makes a profit every time he trades.The condition of the Bitcoin chart in a matter of hours has indeed increased. If he suggested buying Bitcoin and holding it for 60 seconds then selling, roughly how many times the profit would be.IMO, do it yourself if you want to trade Bitcoin without having to trade on the trading platform that it ships with.OP, you have to remember that there are groups with the appearance of professional traders whose job is to find members or followers so that the rating or some kind of points increases for those who succeed in recruiting new members.Be careful.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Quote from: David92506 on June 17, 2023, 02:11:58 AMThank you for taking the time to read my post and respond.I've learned that there are fake crypto websites and if you deposit money into them you will never get your money back.I'm assuming the website she uses is one of them.Good that you've realized it. While reading your story, I've already knew it that it's a scam attempt to you. Didn't you know that even you had someone a video call/chat, there are software that can easily fool you out like split cam and AI voices, etc. These software can make you feel that you're really talking to a woman that's a lot of years younger than you. It's obvious that they want you to trade on that platform that they've made and once you've deposited there, that's the time for you to say goodbye to the money that you've deposited. I don't also understand why that strategy has been told to you to sell at exact 60 seconds after your purchase because it doesn't make sense.

comments.author: Not your key not your BTC
comments.body: Quote from: David92506 on June 16, 2023, 02:22:22 PMShe has $100,000 in her account. She averages $10,000 a month.She will teach me how to trade on that platform.A big question is, why did she teach you? why did she give secrets?If don't have something that she wants from you, she doesn't give it free, think!!

comments.author: Cricktor
comments.body: Think with your brain and not with your dick! Your brain is there for a purpose.  If someone had actually such a trading success, why on earth should (s)he be sharing it with other people? Would you do that if you were her, likely not, it makes no (trading) sense!Why would such a "successful trader" need your money? Maybe you weren't yet at that point with her, were you?Well, as pointed out already by others: for an obvious reason, it's a known scam scheme! (S)he's looking for the best of yours, your money! There's a whole scam industry with this story, don't fall for it. Too many desperate men out there...

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Quote from: yudi09 on June 17, 2023, 05:23:03 AMClearly ask how he trades if he is a professional trader who always makes a profit every time he trades.The condition of the Bitcoin chart in a matter of hours has indeed increased. If he suggested buying Bitcoin and holding it for 60 seconds then selling, roughly how many times the profit would be.Doesn't make a difference when OP is being redirected to a fake exchange the scammer actually owns.The whole situation matches with pig-butchering scam, case is a confirmed scam, see: Asian guy/girl from online dating mentors you to invest in Forex/Cryptocurrency Trading -- Sha Zhu Pan 杀猪盘 or Pig-Butchering Scam

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: Potato Chips on June 18, 2023, 09:45:04 PMDoesn't make a difference when OP is being redirected to a fake exchange the scammer actually owns.This was exactly what in my mind, was to get a scam.Because I personally experience this but fortunately they didn't fool me with this kind of scam strategy. They want me to create an account on an exchange that I don't know or is not a popular exchange and let them manage your account which if you think it's obviously a scam attempt. There are too many of them not only on the dating site platform, but they are also everywhere on every social media platform like Facebook and Telegram which they're very rampant on this fraudulent activity. Be careful, there might be a hidden agenda with his propaganda offering or teaching trading.

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Quote from: David92506 on June 16, 2023, 02:22:22 PMShe tells me to Buy Bitcoin and keep it for 60 seconds and then sell it.-snip-She gives me another trade, with the same instructions, Buy and hold on for 60 seconds and then sell. But I don't know how to do that. Bitcoin goes up and up.I'm amazed at how this professional group is able to do this. Beside the several weird things filling your post I would like to dig more into these two lines : would you care to explain how she, allegedly, does 10K monthly with this kind of trades?

comments.author: yudi09
comments.body: Quote from: Potato Chips on June 18, 2023, 09:45:04 PMQuote from: yudi09 on June 17, 2023, 05:23:03 AMClearly ask how he trades if he is a professional trader who always makes a profit every time he trades.The condition of the Bitcoin chart in a matter of hours has indeed increased. If he suggested buying Bitcoin and holding it for 60 seconds then selling, roughly how many times the profit would be.Doesn't make a difference when OP is being redirected to a fake exchange the scammer actually owns.It's not wrong when I want the OP to ask the lady how she trades so that she always gets the profit.Don't because the woman has a charming face we can be easily deceived.There are various modes of fraud that do not know who will be the victim, so a careful attitude is needed.If people want to trade and the like, currently there is quite a lot of space available to be used as a place to study without having to follow the modes offered by other people.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: First of all of based my experience, there is no guarantee you buy and hold it for 60 seconds and sell it and made a profit.60 seconds is 1 Minute candlestick and its very hard to predict accurately tho if you win the trade you are master because some of trading indicator or pattern mostly doesn't work there and I just hear the app called BitContractPro DYOR first before made any decision

comments.author: CarnagexD
comments.body: Quote from: David92506 on June 16, 2023, 02:22:22 PMI met a young and beautiful Asian woman on a dating site. She is 27 years younger than me.She belongs to a professional cryptocurrency organization that provides multi-millionaires with when and what coin to trade. About 3 - 4 trades a week.The reason she belongs to the group is because her Uncle runs it.She said she will give me the trades for free.We have done several video chats so she is real.I used to trade FOREX heavily so I thought Cryptocurrency would be similar.I open a Coinbase account.She tells me to Buy Bitcoin and keep it for 60 seconds and then sell it.I don't know how to work Coinbase but I do see Bitcoin go up and up.So now I'm trying to learn how to trade on Coinbase.She gives me another trade, with the same instructions, Buy and hold on for 60 seconds and then sell. But I don't know how to do that. Bitcoin goes up and up.I'm amazed at how this professional group is able to do this. She said that I can't trade on Coinbase because it doesn't offer the features that her platform does. On her platform, she can Buy and hold on to it and Sell it in 60 seconds. You can't do that with Coinbase.So she wants me to transfer all of my Coinbase money into the platform she uses, which is:BitContractProShe has $100,000 in her account. She averages $10,000 a month.She will teach me how to trade on that platform.As an ending of fthe story, that She is actually a He. And OP will be asked for the seed phrase of the wallet and he will give it lovingly. Then he will not get any reply back. Then he will regret it happily ever after.Quote from: noorman0 on June 17, 2023, 12:08:13 AMThe way the "woman" charms you is like a classic scam that happens on many dating sites. I think an average profit of 10k per month is achievable if she is only a professional trader, and generally they don't have the time just to give random beginners guidance specifically because it will return them nothing.I hope you haven't fallen too much into that woman's trap. Better forget this story, you will not get a sweet ending.Exactly. So I hope you get back to your senses anytime soon. Trading is about system you know. It's not simping over a woman. You can do better than that king. Don't get scammed.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: This is how my dreams looks like which never came true all that came true is a girl text me some advertisements and ask some funds in return so that she could made me millionaire and reject that offer and make a biggest mistake of my life (hahaha).I thought the same will happen with you but you are living my dream life so best luck and i hope this will not end up like mine, I think you could easily judge the reasons of your gf behind teaching you trading because no ones do anything without motive. I have see so many examples in my life.Maybe at the end she will ask you to teach her forex as you said you have been into forex for so long and i think due to this skill of yours, you can easily detect if she is telling you truth or not.

comments.author: usekevin
comments.body: It’s not a real one,many people use such techniques to scam the new people and the new traders.When you are ready to learn trading,it’s easy to learn using the online resources.Because the rare resources are in you tube now.You just need to spend some time to learn the trading,even it’s crypto or forex trading.Many fake image from social media was used to scam people on trading.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Quote from: greengrassis on June 22, 2023, 06:59:02 PMAre you sure you trust this person to teach you how to trade? Is it really safe? He’s being fooled here and getting to be scammed. Why you have to trust that women when it comes to your finances when it fact you just met on a dating site? I’d rather date her but will never expose my finances and trading capacity to anyone I don’t fully know yet better to focus on what you search for a women on a dating site in the first place. Don’t trust her because its too risky and in trading, you should have your own strategy.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: David92506 on June 16, 2023, 02:22:22 PM<snip>Op, You really need to wise up. No one with such trading success will be scouting for beginners on a dating site. To waste her time teaching you the newbie to what end? Also, how can she tell you to buy Bitcoin and hold for 60 second and then sell? What kind of trading strategy is that? Like someone advised, you should think with your head and not the other way around. I want to believe she must have weighed you properly and concluded that you're naive and wants to capitalize on that to scam you. She's tricking you to transfer your Bitcoin to the site she provided and the moment you do that, your bitcoin will be gone to the great beyond and never to be seen again. Please don't send it and stay safe.

comments.author: Farma
comments.body: Quote from: Potato Chips on June 18, 2023, 09:45:04 PMQuote from: yudi09 on June 17, 2023, 05:23:03 AMClearly ask how he trades if he is a professional trader who always makes a profit every time he trades.The condition of the Bitcoin chart in a matter of hours has indeed increased. If he suggested buying Bitcoin and holding it for 60 seconds then selling, roughly how many times the profit would be.Doesn't make a difference when OP is being redirected to a fake exchange the scammer actually owns.The whole situation matches with pig-butchering scam, case is a confirmed scam, see: Asian guy/girl from online dating mentors you to invest in Forex/Cryptocurrency Trading -- Sha Zhu Pan 杀猪盘 or Pig-Butchering Scam I also suspect that by the end of the story, he was pointed at a new exchange instead of using coinbase. it's quite strange when you are satisfied using coinbase, and get profit there.It's just that if the OP takes advantage of this situation, he has gained new knowledge about trading, and the 60 second method. well, if he can make use of that, he has gained new knowledge. it's just that, it seems like he is really interested in and believes in this woman. However, if you're new to her, it's best not to believe what she says.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Oh hey women!!!?? This woman has definitely made you fall prey to her beauty!! What are these magical deals that take place in just 60 seconds??!! Never in my life have I heard of such a magical exchange!!Better forget about that charming woman before you lose your money, they sure use women on these sites to trap men and steal their money, so you need to get away immediately before you fall victim to women's lust.
